Pick.im

Pick.im is a freelance marketplace. It provides an easy, searchable, geo-located way for clients to find and contact freelancers in their area.

http://pick.im/

What we did for Pick.im:

Flatterline developed the Pick.im application in Ruby on Rails on a shoestring budget. We implemented the core features, a robust geo-located search and enhanced administration features and launched the site to beta testers in a short timeframe.

What Pick.im had to say about Flatterline:

Flatterline is the best development studio I have ever used, hands down. The code is clean, scales well, is delivered on time and with style.

Highly recommend them!

Andrew Hyde, Founder
